natural solution: Working from the inside out, we first compute $f(2) = 2^2-3(2)+1=-1$. Next we find $f(-1)=(-1)^2 + 1=2$. Putting these together, we have: $f(f(f(f(f(f(2))))))=f(f(f(f(f(-1)))))=f(f(f(f(2))))=f(f(f(-1)))=f(f(2))=f(-1)=\boxed{2}.$
